message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15000. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12000. This is an exceptional deal considering the immense value it holds for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.
